ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.database.providers.firebase

Class FirebaseDatabaseQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.database.providers.firebase.FirebaseDatabaseQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseQuery

    public class FirebaseDatabaseQuery
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseQuery
    This is a concrete implementation of DatabaseQuery. Its implementation makes use of Firebase API, so needs to be modified if database provider is changed.

    • Constructor Summary

      • get

        public DatabaseSnapshot get()
        Description copied from interface: DatabaseQuery
        Get the database snapshot given by the current query. Note that this method is a blocking method, meaning that it cannot be used on the UI thread. You may want to run this method on a new thread and, after that, do something else on the UI thread.
        Specified by:
        get in interface DatabaseQuery
